com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.crx

Interface SignatureHelper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CRXSignatureHelper

    public interface SignatureHelper
    Implementations sign byte arrays using public/private key pairs.
    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Brian Matthews

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean check(byte[] data, PublicKey key, byte[] signature)
      Check that the signature is valid using the public key.
      byte[] sign(byte[] data, PrivateKey key)
      Generate the signature for a byte array using the private key.

    • Method Detail

      • sign

        byte[] sign(byte[] data,
          PrivateKey key)
            throws GeneralSecurityException
        Generate the signature for a byte array using the private key.
        Parameters:
        data - The byte array.
        key - private key.
        Returns:
        The signature as a byte array.
        Throws:
        GeneralSecurityException - If there was a error generating the signature.

      • check

        boolean check(byte[] data,
            PublicKey key,
            byte[] signature)
              throws GeneralSecurityException
        Check that the signature is valid using the public key.
        Parameters:
        data - The data for which the signature was generated.
        key - The public key.
        signature - The signature.
        Returns:
        true if the signature was valid. Otherwise, false.
        Throws:
        GeneralSecurityException - If there was an error validating the signature.
